channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 1st Gen EPYC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 1st Gen EPYC

item.title: CVE-2023-20527|2024-08-02T09:05:36.888Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20epyc
item.description: Improper syscall input validation in the ASP Bootloader may allow a privileged attacker to read memory out-of-bounds, potentially leading to a denial-of-service.
